note:
Friendly doctor person providing transient random-fedi toots with announcements.
I grew up in Alabama but settled down in Portland and then Beaverton, OR. Cancer has whisked me from being a full-time family physician to being a disabled stay-at-home dad. Walker user on chemo. I'm allergic to cats and dogs but my cat and dog don't seem to care. Awkward Linux-type computer toucher.
